description: Table contains information related to DICOM about a document.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: ARCHV_ACCESSION_NUM
columns.description: The accession number of the imaging study, as pulled from the DICOM image archive (attribute 0008,0050).

columns.name: STUDY_INST_UID
columns.description: DICOM Study Instance UID (attribute 0020,000D).

columns.name: STUDY_DATE
columns.description: The date this imaging study was performed (attribute 0008,0020).

columns.name: STUDY_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The description of this imaging study (attribute 0008,1030).

columns.name: SENDING_AE_TITLE
columns.description: The title of the sending DICOM Application Entity.

columns.name: BELONGS_TO_STUDY_DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the ID of the study that this series belongs to.

columns.name: MODALITY
columns.description: This is the DICOM modality type, as pulled from a DICOM image header (attribute 0008,0060).

columns.name: REFERRING_PROV
columns.description: Referring physician as per DICOM attributes (attribute 0008,0090).

columns.name: SERIES_TM
columns.description: The series time per the DICOM attributes (attribute 0008,0031).

columns.name: SERIES_DESC
columns.description: The series description as per the DICOM attributes (attribute 0008,103E).

columns.name: BODY_PART_EXAMINED
columns.description: This column stores the body part examined as per the DICOM attribute header (attribute 0018,0015).

columns.name: ACQUISITION_TM
columns.description: This column stores the acquisition time of this series (attribute 0008,0032).

columns.name: SERIES_LATERALITY
columns.description: The DICOM laterality for this series (attribute 0020,0060).

columns.name: SERIES_INSTANCE_UID
columns.description: The series instance UID for this imaging series (attribute 0020,000E).

columns.name: BELONGS_TO_SERIES_DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the ID of the series that this image belongs to.

columns.name: PRIMARY_IMAGE_INST_UID
columns.description: This is the DICOM SOP instance UID (attribute 0008,0018). If this is a CT/MR, then it is the SOP instance UID of the first image in the series.

columns.name: INST_SOP_CLASS_UID
columns.description: The instance SOP class UID specifies the exact type of this image or other DICOM document (attribute 0008,0016).

columns.name: RESCALE_INTERCEPT
columns.description: Rescale intercept value from the DICOM header (attribute 0028,1052).

columns.name: RESCALE_SLOPE
columns.description: Rescale slope value from the DICOM header (attribute 0028,1053).

columns.name: RESCALE_TYPE
columns.description: Rescale type value from the DICOM header (attribute 0028,1054).

columns.name: SAMPLES_PER_PIXEL
columns.description: Number of samples per pixel (attribute 0028,0002).

columns.name: PIXELS_PER_ROW
columns.description: The number of pixels per row for this image (attribute 0028,0010).

columns.name: IMAGE_COLUMNS
columns.description: The number of columns of this image (attribute 0028,0011).

columns.name: BITS_ALLOCATED
columns.description: Number of bits allocated. This is bits per pixel (attribute 0028,0100).

columns.name: BITS_STORED
columns.description: The number of bits stored in pixels (attribute 0028,0101).

columns.name: PIXEL_SPACING_X_DIR
columns.description: Pixel spacing in X direction. This is the first piece of the DICOM attribute (attribute 0028,0030).

columns.name: PIXEL_SPACING_Y_DIR
columns.description: Pixel spacing in Y direction. This is the second piece of the DICOM attribute (attribute 0028,0030).

columns.name: PHOTOMETRIC_INTERPRT
columns.description: Photometric interpretation as per the DICOM header (attribute 0028,0004).

columns.name: IMAGE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The image type. A multi-frame image is (usually) a movie type image. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


SINGLE_FRAME


MULTI_FRAME

columns.name: NUM_OF_FRAMES
columns.description: The number of frames in this image (attribute 0028,0008).

columns.name: MAX_PIX_VALUE
columns.description: This is the maximum pixel value in this image. This value is used to determine usable window width and level adjustment ranges.

columns.name: FRAME_TM
columns.description: This column stores the frame time as time between image frames in milliseconds and it is used for setting initial display speeds.

columns.name: IMAGE_ORIENTATION
columns.description: Image orientation defines the spatial position of the patient in relation to the image (derived from attribute 0020,0037).

columns.name: PAT_ORIENTATION
columns.description: The patient orientation defines the patient position in relation to the image (attribute 0020, 0020).

columns.name: SLICE_THICKNESS
columns.description: This column stores the slice thickness of the image. This is only relevant for cross-sectional images (attribute 0018,0050).

columns.name: IMAGE_LOCATION
columns.description: This column stores a URL that can be used to retrieve this image through a WADO-RS web service call.
